resources:
ZWallet
Hello blank fragment Login Sign Up Login to your existing account to access all the features in Zwallet. Create your account to access Zwallet. Enter your email address Enter your username Enter your password Already have an account? Let’s Already have an account? Let’s Forgot password? Enter your Zwallet e-mail so we can send you a password reset link. Confirm Reset Password Confirm new password Please input your OTP We have sent your OTP (One Time Password) code via Email Create Security PIN Create a PIN that’s contain 6 digits number for security purpose in Zwallet. PIN Successfully Created Your PIN was successfully created and you can now access all the features in Zwallet. Login to your new account and start exploring! Virtual Account Number Transaction History View All Find Receiver Transfer Transfer to Details Amount Balance left Date & time Notes Continue Transfer Now We provide you virtual account number for top up via nearest ATM. How to Top-Up Go to the nearest ATM or you can use E-Banking. Type your security number on the ATM or E-Banking.n Select “Transfer” in the menu Type the virtual account number that we provide you at the top. Type the amount of the money you want to top up. Read the summary details. Press transfer / top up. You can see your money in Zwallet within 3 hours. Personal Information We got your personal information from the sign up process. If you want to make changes on your information, contact our support. First Name Last Name Verified Email Number Phone Enter Your PIN Enter your 6 digits PIN for confirmation to continue transferring money. Change Password You must enter your current password and then type your new password twice. Current password New password Repeat password Change PIN Enter your current 6 digits Zwallet PIN below to continue to the next steps. Type your new 6 digits security PIN to use in Zwallet. Manage Phone You can only delete the phone number and then you must add another phone number. Enter your phone number Submit
